dict.string:
Changelog: 2.2 - Supporting folders with sticky/set-uid/set-gid bits (FTP) - Updated Dutch localization - Updated French localization - Minor performance improvements
2.2b6 - Preliminary support for Windows, VMS and OS/2 file listings (FTP) - Properly deleting symbolic links (FTP) - Displaying link icons in browser - Downloading files from FTP servers not supporting the SIZE command (FTP) - Fixed a bug where overwritten files with SFTP got corrupted (Thanks to Jan!) - Contextual Menu support - Bug fixes
2.2b5 - Chinese (Traditional) Localization - Korean Localization - Passphrases for private key files are stored in the Keychain (SSH) - Bookmark editor allows to specify the port number - When a bookmark is edited, the properties are updated in the bookmark drawer instantly - A confirmation dialog is displayed before deleting a bookmark - A confirmation dialog is displayed when connecting to a new site in a browser still connected to another host - Transcript messages are only shown in the corresponding browser - Fixed a bug which caused the browser window to be 'frozen' after an upload - Option to adjust the 'LIST' command sent (FTP) - Fixed a bug which caused a crash when not connected to a network - Updated application icon
2.2b4 - Fixed a bug that with some servers the permissions could not be modified (FTP) - When addding a transfer to the queue it is highlighted - Improved login process - Updated Japanese localization
2.2b3 - Caching folder listings - Auto-refresh the folder listing after uploading a file - Sending 'LIST -a' to list directories (FTP) - Fixed a bug where entries in the queue would be deleted too early
2.2b2 - Updated Japanese localization - Updated French localization - Updated Portuguese localization - Updated Italian localization - The log is now written with a fixed-width font - Various minor improvements
2.2b1 - Keychain integration - New file transfer manager - Full Unicode support - Choose character encoding for file listings - Support for public key authentication (SSH) - Live filtering directory listings - Improved Rendezvous support (jmDNS 0.2) - Drag files from the browser to the transfer manager - Drag links to the transfer manager to start download - Browser can be customized to show/hide certain columns - Japanese Localization - Italian Localization - Portuguese Localization - Spanish Localization - French Localization - Option to disable 'CHMOD' after upload (FTP) - Option to disable sending the 'SYST' command (FTP) - When clicking the dock icon and now window is active, a new browser window is opened - Bookmarks can be rearranged - When login credentials aren't reasonable, ask before trying to login
